thread.title: John O’Shea has blasted Wales star Gareth Bale for his dangerous tackle in explosive World Cup qaulifier in Dublin
thread.title_full: John O’Shea has blasted Wales star Gareth Bale for his dangerous tackle in explosive World Cup qaulifier in Dublin

author: whaughton
title: John O’Shea has blasted Wales star Gareth Bale for his dangerous tackle in explosive World Cup qaulifier in Dublin
text:
EFL Bale blast John O’Shea has blasted Wales star Gareth Bale for his dangerous tackle in explosive World Cup qaulifier in Dublin 
The Sunderland defender has launched a bitter attack on the Real Madrid star after seeing replay of Bale's dangerous tackle in Friday's ill-tempered World Cup qualifier by Warren Haughton
